data.title: Best Coney Island
data.text: I love this place.  This is such a different Coney that I have been to.  More menu choices.  ITe very clean, spacious.

data.title: One of our favorite Coney's
data.text: We love coming to this Coney Island - the service is impeccable and the food is always good. We always get breakfast here but once got a Greek salad and that was also excellent.

data.title: Always good!
data.text: My husband and I have been here numerous times. Good, fast, And friendly!  Excellent breakfasts and give their hummus topped with grilled chicken a try!

data.title: Great food and service!
data.text:
This family style restaurant had a large selection on their menu with Greek options as well as family favorites. The chicken lemon rice soup was exceptional, perfect blend of creamy, lemony, and nice white chicken pieces.The Greek salad paired wonderfully with our soup and the dressing was delicious!

Tiff provided great friendly service and I would highly recommend this restaurant for people in the area and wanting a yummy lunch without a huge price tag.

data.title: All around family
data.text: I have eating here for the last year. Every meal has been more than I expected especially breakfast omelettes and pancakes. Serve is always fast and professional. You never run out of coffee

data.title: Big open eating area, food served quickly
data.text:
This is one of those sit-down fast food places.  You order at the counter and and are served at your table.  This place serves American and Greek foods. Nice high ceilings and pleasant to walk into.

We ordered mass quantities of food.  Male sibling has eyes bigger than his stomach.  I really cannot remember all that was ordered, other than we did have some onion rings, I had a Coney Island Dog and shared an enormous salad with everyone else.  Our table was totally full of food, but it was, oh, gee, very, very inexpensive.  Male sibling (who paid) got off cheap).

Service was pretty quick.  All food came hot to piping hot!  All fried items served in humongous portions.  Salad big, cold and good.  Lots of dressing for items that required such. Food tasty enough.  This place would be good for a big casual family or team get-together and whoever paid would get off cheap for a whole-lotta feeding.

Not fine dining, but decent, casual dining.

Coney Island Dogs are the things around this area.  Seem to be served at Greek-American food diners, such as this one was.  I was not impressed with the dog, but then again it was my first time having one.  I made inquiries of the young woman that served us and she gave me a "deer in the headlights" look when I asked a couple of questions about the dogs, but came back quickly with answers.  Probably I came on too foodie for her, but she was helpful.

I might go here again, but I would stick to the Greek stuff.  Recommended it you are really, really hungry and are in the area.  Decent fast-ish food at great prices, 'specially when compared to where I live!

data.title: Just what you'd expect, only better.
data.text: Lunch out cause I was dying for a Coney. Wife had the chili cup, while I settled for the Coney with the works! Very good. Lemonade hit the spot too.

data.title: Something for Everyone
data.text: We went with a large party of friends with kids to avoid the restaurants at the mall. No one ordered a Coney, but the was something on the expansive menu for everyone. There are traditional and nontraditional Greek offerings (gyro omelette?). Everyone, including kids, ordered something different and there were no complaints. Our table was noisy, messy and had kids running around, but it never phased the staff who was very polite, friendly and accommodating.

data.title: Good lunch, very good service
data.text:
I stopped here for a quick lunch while in the area.  Overall, the service here was quick and efficient, and the food good.  Definitely a place to stop for a good, quick, resonably priced meal.

Overall, I was in and out the door in about 35 minutes;  not bad for a weekday lunch hour.  Although the service was quick, I never felt rushed by the waitstaff.

I ordered a grilled chicken salad.  The salad arrived promptly, and was large.  The grilled chicken on the salad was an ample portion, and very tender.  All in all, a good salad, and a good experience.

data.title: My "go to" restaurant
data.text:
I visit this place frequently and I've always been happy.  Typical coney place but perhaps a little nicer/newer facility and seems a little cleaner than most.  Food has always been good -- same with the service.

When I've ordered a chicken gyro or a greek salad, the presentation was way beyond what I expected from a Coney.  They also have an outdoor patio with a half dozen or so tables.  Unlike some places, they don't forget about you when you sit out there.

I really like this place.  It feels like my "home base".

data.title: A really terrific coney island
data.text: I've been going to this place since it opened and have ALWAYS had a great experience.  I've had breakfast, lunch, and dinner, and the food and service have always been good.  They have daily specials, a variety of dinners, and then the usual coney fare.  I've been particularly pleased with the friendliness and attentiveness of the servers.

data.title: Coney
data.text:
Not a hot dog stand as those outside the Big D would have you believe!  These coney places have the best in fast Greek food dishes while serving food at a blazing fast pace.  Reasonably priced & quick service.  I swear I got my food even before I ordered!

But don't order side dishes - that is where they get you and significantly increase prices of your meal.
